actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Great Salt Lake National Monument, in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of the Great Salt Lake National Monument, in the State of Utah. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Great Salt Lake National Monument, in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.
